about.intro: I was born in Cairo, Egypt. In 2026, I am 25 years old.I live in Cairo, I studied Accounting and Management at Ain Shams University, Faculty of Business. However, I was not passionate about accounting and did not perform well in it, so I decided to search for another career path.
about.journey: I explored many fields, but none of them truly connected with me until January 2023, when I discovered programming—and it stuck. I spent nearly two years learning through YouTube, until I realized that I needed a mentor, a structured learning path, and to be closer to a real professional team in the industry.
about.platform: By the grace of Allah, I found the Almdrasa platform, which was extremely helpful and transformative for me. Through it, I was fortunate to learn:

points.dataStructures: Data structures and their importance in building high-performance and scalable websites.
points.modernTools: How to use modern packages while developing strong research skills to build professional websites.
points.aiTools: How to use AI tools in website development—breaking the barrier of working with them and learning how to write strong prompts to complete tasks faster and improve code quality.
points.teamwork: How to collaborate professionally with team members through courses provided by the diploma.

about.mindset: Following the diploma instructors reshaped my mindset, moving me from simply writing code to understanding the strategic business value of a website.
